answers.answer: I have GD and I'm currently 32weeks. My Lil girls weight is at 4.11lbs. My Dr is planning my c section at 38weeks. It just depends on how your baby is doing is what usually makes Dr's decide on how long to wait. Wishing you a healthy and safe delivery.

question: I cant wait to meet my little man. But does anyone else on here have/had gestational diabetes?? If so,  how much did your bundle weigh at birth? How far along did your dr make you wait?? Im due April 8,2014 but we've been discussing induction April 1,2014 which puts me at 39 weeks exactly. !! :)
title: 32+1 ♥
